comments: See also: Franz August Kramer (1842-1914), teacher in Chemnitz (TL2 3908).
examples: Stanhopea jenischiana F.Kramer ex Rchb.f. in Bot. Zeitung (Berlin) 10: 934. 1852.
notes: Franz Kramer was the leading gardener of Herr Rucker-Jenisch, at Kleinflottbek, near Hamburg [vide Gard. Chron., ser. 3, 4: 323. 1888]; Eponymy: Cattleya krameriana Rchb.f. (1888)
source: Death year in: J. Hort. Cottage Gard. ser. 3, 23: 475. 1891 (via Adrian Stockdale) https://www.biodiversitylibrary.org/page/55549645
